name: Myths, Masks, and Minutes Spent Apart

cards.rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card until this enchantment leaves the battlefield. You lose 1 life.
Your opponents can’t cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.
When this creature enters, you may discard a card. If you do, search your library for a card with the same mana value as the discarded card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.special_text:
[+2]: Draw a card, then each opponent discards a card.
[-2]: Exile target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.  Each opponent sacrifices a permanent that shares a type with the exiled permanent.
[-X]: Exile a card in your graveyard with mana value X. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Exile a card from your graveyard: Return another target non-Faerie creature or enchantment you control to its owner’s hand. Activate once each turn.

Prowess
When this creature attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to this creature’s power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

Vanishing X [i](That permanent enters with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]
When this enchantment enters or you remove a time counter from it, you may exile target nonland card from your graveyard with mana value less than or equal to the number of time counters on this enchantment plus one. Copy it and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

Indestructible, haste
This creature can’t block.
Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

If you control three or fewer lands, exile target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.
Cycling—Sacrifice a land. [i](Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)[/i]

Vigilance
When this creature enters, surveil 1, then create a Weapon token. [i](It’s an Equipment with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”)[/i]

When this creature enters, choose one —
• Remove up to two counters from target permanent you don’t control.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

Deception {2}{W} [i]({2}{W}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Flying
When this enchantment enters, exile target nonland permanent you don’t control with mana value 3 or less until Innocence Denied leaves the battlefield.

Exile target creature you control or creature card in your graveyard with mana value 3 or less. Then return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.notes:
Fassahd
Anina
Her future uncertain, she chose to focus on the present; putting one foot in front of the other.

cards.rules_text: Boast — {W}: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control. [i](Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)[/i]

Vigilance
Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
Activated abilities cost {1} more to activate unless they’re mana abilities.

Boast — {W}: This creature gains first strike until end of turn. [i](Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)[/i]
Boast — {W}: Until your next turn, target player that was dealt combat damage this turn can’t cast noncreature spells.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile two cards from your graveyard. If you do, create a 3/2 white Wolf Spirit creature token.

Choose one, then each opponent chooses another one —
• Destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater.
• Destroy all creatures with power 2 or less.
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all enchantments.
• Exile all graveyards.
Whenever another creature you control becomes blocked, you may return it to your hand. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

Deception—Exile a card from your graveyard. [i](Exile a card from your graveyard, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Boast—Discard a card: This creature gains indestructible until end of turn. [i](Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)[/i]

When this creature enters, create a Weapon token. [i](It’s an Equipment with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”)[/i]
{T}: Target equipped creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

Flying
If damage would be dealt to this creature or a planeswalker you control, prevent 1 of that damage. If it’s an Elissia planeswalker, prevent 2 of that damage instead.

Deception {1}{W} [i]({1}{W}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Flying
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, noncreature spells that player casts cost {2} more to cast until your next turn.

Vigilance
When this creature enters, create a Weapon token and attach it to a creature you control. When you do, exile up to one target creature you don’t control for as long as that Weapon is attached to that creature. [i](A Weapon is an Equipment with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”)[/i]

Vigilance
Boast — {2}{W}: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. [i](Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)[/i]

Flying, vigilance
Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, prevent all damage that would be dealt to other creatures you control this turn.

Whenever you commune, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. [i](You commune as you spend your third mana on unique activated abilities during a turn.)[/i]
{2}{U}: This creature gains flying until end of turn.

Flash
Flying
When this creature enters, target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn.
Whenever you commune, you may tap target creature. [i](You commune as you spend your third mana on unique activated abilities during a turn.)[/i]

Vanishing 3 [i](This creature enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]
When this creature leaves the battlefield, if it had no time counters on it, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

Flash
Flying
When this creature enters, tap up to one target creature and put a stun counter on it.

Vanishing 2 [i](This permanent enters with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]
When the last time counter is removed from this enchantment, up to one target creature’s owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Return target creature to its owner’s hand. If that creature was attacking, surveil 1.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each noncreature, nonland card in your graveyard.
This creature has ward {4} as long as an opponent has cast one or fewer spells this turn.
Exile three noncreature, nonland cards from your graveyard: This creature can’t be blocked this turn.

This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, put exactly two cards from a single graveyard on the bottom of their owner’s library. If you do, draw a card.

Vanishing X [i](This permanent enters with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]
Whenever you remove a time counter from this enchantment, draw a card.

Choose up to X. X can’t be more than the number of creatures you control.
• Target player creates two 1/1 blue Goblin creature tokens with prowess.

• Target player draws a card.

At the beginning of each end step, if you’ve communed this turn, create a 3/3 red Spirit creature token. [i](You’ve communed if you’ve spent three or more mana on unique activated abilities during a turn.)[/i]
{1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Counter target spell.

Flying
{U}, Sacrifice !Courier of the Tribes: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a permanent you control.

When this creature enters, look at target player’s hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

You may have this creature enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has vanishing 3 if that creature doesn’t have vanishing. Menace
This creature can’t block.
Until end of turn, target creature gains “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control. When you do, each opponent loses 2 life.”

When this creature dies, you may pay X life, where X is equal to half its power, rounded down. If you do, you draw X cards.

Flying, lifelink
When !Feeder of Lost Thoughts enters, exile X cards from your graveyard. If you do, target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

Whenever you lose life, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This ability triggers only once each turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if this creature’s power is 5 or greater, draw a card.

Reveal the top four cards of your library. For each card revealed this way, an opponent may discard a card. If they do, put that card into your graveyard. Otherwise, put it into your hand and you lose 2 life.

You may pay {3}. If you do, choose a nonland card name. Otherwise, choose the name of up to one nonland card in a graveyard. Search target player’s graveyard, hand, and libraries for any number of cards with that name and exile them. That player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

Vanishing 4 [i](This permanent enters with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]

Whenever you remove one or more counters from a permanent you control, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
{2}{B}: Remove a counter from target permanent you control.

Lifelink
When this creature enters, each opponent that controls more creatures than you sacrifices a creature.

Menace, reach

Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a time counter on this creature and you gain 1 life.

As an additional cost to cast to cast this spell, pay 4 life or sacrifice a creature.
Flying

Haste

Deception {R} [i]({R}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token and exile the top card of that player’s library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.

If your life total is less than your starting life total, this spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the difference.

Reach

When this creature enters, put two time counters on each nonland artifact and each nonland enchantment.
Nonland artifacts and enchantments that don’t have vanishing have vanishing 2. [i](They enter with two time counters on them. At the beginning of its controller’s upkeep, they remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, they sacrifice it.)[/i]

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, add {G}. [i](The mana empties at end of combat.)[/i]

This creature gets +1/+1 for each type noted for it.
Whenever a card is put into a graveyard from anywhere, note one of its card types that hasn’t been noted by this creature.

Defender, reach, ward {2}
Pay 2 life: This creature can attack as though it didn’t have defender this turn.
Boast — {1}{G}: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. [i](Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)[/i]

{T}: Put a loyalty counter on a Kriemhild planeswalker you control.
{2}{G}, {T}: You may activate an ability of a planeswalker you control.

Vigilance

{3}{G}: Attach an Equipment you control to this creature.
Boast — {G}: Add three mana in any combination of colors. You can’t spend this mana to cast spells. [i](Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)[/i]

Trample

This spell costs {3} less if you’ve communed this turn. [i](You’ve communed if you’ve spent three or more mana on unique activated abilities during a turn.)[/i]

Then if it has no more time counters on it, cast it without paying its mana cost.” [i](You commune as you spend your third mana on unique activated abilities during a turn.)[/i]
Target creature you control deals damage equal to twice its power to target creature or planeswalker you don’t control.

Choose one. If you have 10 or less life, choose any number instead.
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if there is a land card in your graveyard. Then, that creature fights target creature you don’t control.

Protection from tokens
At the beginning of each player’s upkeep, that player sacrifices a nonlegendary, nontoken permanent. If they sacrificed a creature, they create a 1/1 blue Elemental creature token with flying. If they sacrificed a land, they create a Treasure token. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Each player discards a card. Each player who discarded a nonland card this way draws a card.
[-1]: Return target nonland card from your graveyard to your hand. This planeswalker deals damage to you equal to that card’s mana value.
[-2]: Sacrifice a permanent. When you do, destroy target permanent that shares a type with the sacrificed permanent.

[+1]: Up to one target creature you control can’t be blocked this turn. Return that creature to its owner’s hand at the beginning of the next end step.
[-X]: Exile target nonland permanent with mana value X or less.
[-X]: Repeat the following process X times. Exile a non-Planeswalker permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control. X can’t be zero.

You may play land cards from your graveyard. Lands played this way enter with a finality counter on them.
[+1]: Surveil 2. You gain 2 life.
[0]: You may play an additional land this turn.
[-4]: Create a 4/4 green Elemental creature token.
